title: Bus services limited to 50%
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Transport Commission states that private bus services will be limited to 50% today due to the ongoing fuel crisis.
Accordingly, the NTC Director General, Commander Nilan Miranda stated that all SLTB buses have been directed to bus depots in order to receive fuel form available stocks.
He added that fuel has been made available to the buses through the Makumbura Multi purpose bus terminal, and mentioned that this 50% capacity extends to long distance buses as well.
